subject: Football
Playoff Games
lead_paragraph: Jets defensive end Shaun Ellis, who broke his hand on the first play from scrimmage against San Diego, said he'll put off surgery until after he can help the Jets make the Super Bowl.
snippet: Jets defensive end Shaun Ellis, who broke his hand on the first play from scrimmage against San Diego, said he'll put off surgery until after he can help the Jets make the Super Bowl.
